longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay. 

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a copy of a pre-arranged approval from
  immigration can obtain a  Waiver of the Visa  on arrival.
  Fee: TTD 400.-.
Minors:
- Foreign minors must 
Warning:
- Nationals of Niger who have visited Guinea, Liberia or
  Sierra Leone within the last 42 days will be refused entry. 
- Visitors must hold return/onward tickets
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year.
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided continuing their journey on the same
  day.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all travellers aged 9
  months or older, except for those whose itineraries are
  limited to the Isl. of Tobago.
